issues.description: The solutionâ€™s PersonScene view class declares and imports a PersonService field, contradicting the MVC component diagram (where the view should only interact with the controller) and the template (which has no such field). Moreover, this field is never initialized or used, causing a compile error and confusing students about the intended layering.
issues.suggested_fix: Remove the import and declaration of PersonService from PersonScene so that the view only depends on PersonController as shown in the MVC diagram.
